reviewText:
What issue is more prevalent in today's current events than the exploration, or better yet the exploitation of oil.  How many conversations have you had in the past 4 years that surround our true purpose in Iraq?

This compilation puts together some of the greatest examples of propaganda available in our very own American Government archives.  From The Desert Venture, to Destination Earth, this compilation shows you just how our government views oil and shows what lengths they will go to in order to obtain it.
